name: Asagi
text: Falcon Jutsu! Transcendent Skillー Whirling Oblivion!!!
After a fierce battle, Asagi-san's special attack tore the body of the divine beast to pieces.

name: Kiyomaro
text: HRRAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!
The giant boar howled in misery.
Its mountain-like body collapsed to the ground with an earth-shaking sound.

name: Asagi
text: He was pretty tough... His behavior was a bit iffy though.

name: Me
text: Right. One wrong move and we could've been done for. But yeah, his behavior was iffy...
Asagi-san and I lowered our weapons and caught our breaths.
Kiyomaro had been extraordinarily powerful, as one would expect from a divine giant boar.
Not deterred by the cramped confines within the building that put him at a disadvantage, the giant boar had charged at us,
and Asagi-san had withstood the powerful attack with my support, found a slight opening, and unleashed her ultimate attackー
It had been a narrow victory.

name: Kiyomaro
text: Guhhh... To think I would be defeated... But this, too, is my fate.

name: Kiyomaro
text: Tell me your wish, human. I will use the power of the luck slumbering within me to grant it...
The fallen Kiyomaro said, gasping for breath with each word.

name: Me
text: So... Asagi-san, may I use my wish?
As I asked, Asagi-san smiled as if to say "of course."

name: Asagi
text: Yes. The only thing the old lady at Inageya asked of me was to stop this boar from turning into an inauspicious beast.

name: Asagi
text: You can use his luck as you please. ...But, I imagine the way you'll use it is already settled.

name: Me
text: Yes, it is.
My wish, of course, was to "return to my dimension"ー

name: Me
text: Can you do that, Kiyomaro? I want to go back to my world.

name: Kiyomaro
text: That's simple. Comeー
The dying Kiyomaro nodded and released the luck that lay dormant within his giant body.
*Rumble, rumble, rumble...*
Accompanied by a mysterious bellowing sound that shook the air, a massive energy vortex appeared.

name: Asagi
text: This... goes to another dimension...?

name: Kiyomaro
text: ...Now then, I've opened a portal. You should be able to return to your dimension by jumping in here...

name: Me
text: Alright. Thanks, Kiyomaro... Though it's weird to be thanking you.

name: Me
text: You're the one who dragged me here in the first place.

name: Kiyomaro
text: Never mind that. In the end, you are able to go home.

name: Me
text: I don't want to hear it from you.
And stop changing up your tone on a whim too.

name: Kiyomaro
text: Ahem. Well then... I will fade away now.

name: Kiyomaro
text: I have used up all of my power. The next time I appear will be 12 years from now...

name: Me
text: ...Any last words?
I asked Kiyomaro, whose body was starting to disappear.

name: Me
text: (If I really think about it, I feel pity for him...)
He was summoned here and chased around because of the power of his luck.
He might have acted a little weird, but maybe I should forgive him.

name: Kiyomaro
text: No... I'll simply disappear, in accordance with my fate. ...But if there's one thing I regret...

name: Me
text: Regret...?

name: Kiyomaro
text: Just like you humans... I wanted to get engaged to an actress and fly to the moon and things like that... blargh.

name: Me
text: KIYOMAROOOOOOOO!!!!
Leaving behind those lonesome words, the body of Kiyomaro, the divine giant boar, vanished.

name: Me
text: ...Well then, that's that...

name: Asagi
text: ...He was quite the troubled individual, huh.
Asagi-san and I sighed, our mixed feelings again showing on our faces.
We felt like we had spent the whole day getting pushed around by the strangest people.

name: Me
text: Anyway... Thanks, Asagi-san. I owe you a bunch for today.

name: Asagi
text: Eheh, don't worry about it. I just did what I had to do.

name: Asagi
text: But good for you. You're able to go back to your world.

name: Me
text: Yeah.
Surely this was farewell. Asagi-san held out her hand and I grabbed it tightly.

name: Me
text: It kind of feels like a shame. Just getting to know each other and already having to say goodbye.
This young Asagi-san literally lived in a different world.
If we parted ways now, most likely we would never see each other again.

name: Asagi
text: You never know. Recently, demons and other beings with weird powers are showing up more oftenー

name: Asagi
text: You might come here or I might go to there. Something like that could happen again.

name: Me
text: Ahaha, that would be fun.

name: Me
text: (Hm? Come to think of itー)
Asagi-san's comment made me remember something.

name: Me
text: So much has been going on that I didn't get a chance, but... There's something I've been meaning to ask you, Asagi-san.
Just then, my consciousness suddenly started to drift away. It felt as if something was sucking me up off the ground.

name: Asagi
text: Hm? What is itー?
I tried to ask Asagi-san about her younger sister, Sakura, but my consciousness was completely absorbed into the darkness.
Hey, Fuma-kun! How long are you going to keep sleeping~?

name: Me
text: Ugh... H-Huh...? Where am I...?

name: Igawa Sakura
text: Oh!! You're finally up~! Really, what were you thinking?

name: Sakura
text: Talking about how much you wanted to see the first sunrise together and then falling asleep by yourself!

name: Me
text: Huh...? No, I...
I got up.
I was in the freeloader Sakura's room, back at the ever-familiar Fuma residence.
Right in front of me was a game console that had been left on.
Snacks and magazines were scattered all over the floor.
Everything was the same as before I had left.

name: Me
text: Was it... a dream?
I let out a sigh of relief.

name: Sakura
text: Hmm?

name: Me
text: Well, until a minute ago, I was a giant boar in another dimension and everyone was chasing me.

name: Sakura
text: You had one hell of a first dream of the year, huh, Fuma-kun?

name: Me
text: Haha, that's for sureー
It was... all a dream. Probably.
That was easier to come to grips with than going to another dimension in your sleep.
But stillー

name: Sakura
text: Come on, go and wash your face. I made some New Year's ozoni with Tokiko-san, so let's all eat together!
I stopped Sakura as she was about to return to the living room.

name: Me
text: Ah, wait, Sakura. Before that.

name: Sakura
text: Hm~? Whatcha need?

name: Me
text: It's nothing important, but... are you having fun?

name: Sakura
text: Huh~~~~~~? What are you talking about all of a sudden?

name: Me
text: I-I mean, you were brought here from another dimension. I was just wondering if something was troubling youー

name: Sakura
text: Not at all! Of course I'm having fun!

name: Me
text: Oh. Really...?

name: Sakura
text: Yeah♪ I mean, it was a little troubling at first~

name: Sakura
text: But now I'm having so much fun being together with Tokiko-san and you, Fuma-kun!

name: Me
text: I see... "She" seemed to be doing fine too, so I guess it proves that you're sisters.

name: Sakura
text: That girl?
Hearing me mutter, Sakura tilted her head curiously.

name: Me
text: ...Yeah, I was just thinking about the dream I had last night.

name: Sakura
text: Yeah, yeah. Get out of dreamland and go and wash your face already!

name: Sakura
text: Alright then, I'm gonna ask Tokiko-san to put lots of lily bulbs in the New Year's ozoni for me♪
Sakura grinned happily and returned to the living room.

name: Me
text: Hey, wait! I'm gonna get more lily bulbs than you!
